publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6879.1 Johann Lamont: The UK June 2010 Budget and Equality Assessmentsâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6879) in the name of Bill Kidd, insert at end "; further believes that the Scottish budget must be assessed with due regard to equality; regrets that the Scottish Government has not ensured that single outcome agreements (SOA) submitted by local authorities have been subject to equality impact assessments, and believes that Scottish ministers should not accept SOAs without evidence of equality impact assessments having been carried out." Supported by: Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Jackie Baillie*, Des McNulty*, David Whitton*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Patrick Harvie*, Claire Baker*, Alex Johnstone* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-6879.1 The UK June 2010 Budget and Equality Assessments (lodged on 6 September 2010) Rhona Brankin*, John Park*, George Foulkes*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-6879.1 The UK June 2010 Budget and Equality Assessments (lodged on 6 September 2010) Marilyn Livingstone*
